sentences.en: A ray of sunlight thrust out through the clouds.
sentences.cn: 一缕阳光透过云层照射下来。

sentences.en: An aerial thrust up from the grass verge.
sentences.cn: 一根天线在草地边上竖立着。

sentences.en: He jumped back to avoid another thrust of the knife.
sentences.cn: 他往后一闪，躲避再次捅来的一刀。

sentences.en: He reached the garden gate and thrust his way through it.
sentences.cn: 他来到花园门口，挤了进去。

sentences.en: He skipped aside as his opponent thrust at him.
sentences.cn: 对手向他刺来，他闪身向旁边一躲。

sentences.en: He thrust her away angrily.
sentences.cn: 他怒气冲冲地把她推开.

sentences.en: He thrust her with a spear.
sentences.cn: 他用矛刺她.

sentences.en: He thrust me roughly towards the door.
sentences.cn: 他粗暴地把我推到门口。

sentences.en: He thrust the baby into my arms and ran off.
sentences.cn: 他把婴儿往我怀里一塞就跑了。

sentences.en: I fended off his sword thrust with my spear.
sentences.cn: 他一刀砍来,我拿枪架住.

sentences.en: It provides the thrust that makes the craft move forward.
sentences.cn: 它提供了飞机前进所需的推力。

sentences.en: She thrust a letter into my hand.
sentences.cn: 她把一封信往我手里一塞。

sentences.en: She thrust her way into the crowd.
sentences.cn: 她一头扎进人群。

sentences.en: She tried to thrust back the little stabs of home - sickness.
sentences.cn: 她努力排遣涌上心头的思乡之情.

sentences.en: The conductor brought home the full thrust of the work's emotional resolution.
sentences.cn: 指挥将该作品情感上的毅然决然这一主旨充分表现了出来。

sentences.en: The realisation that she was gone was like a knife thrust.
sentences.cn: 意识到她已走了让人心像刀扎了一样.

sentences.en: They thrust him into the back of a jeep.
sentences.cn: 他们把他猛推入吉普车的后部。

sentences.en: Tony has now been thrust into the limelight, with a high-profile job.
sentences.cn: 托尼现在一下子成了众人关注的中心，因为他有一份经常出镜、见报的工作。

sentences.en: Why has such sadness been thrust upon us?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么要遭这份罪？

sentences.en: With an impatient gesture he thrust the food away from him.
sentences.cn: 他不耐烦地把吃的东西猛地推开.

words.tran_cn: 有强大推进力的；有进取心的
（火箭）[航] 推进器；向上钻营的人
推，挤；迫使接受；延伸（thrust的ing形式）
插入；用向某人刺去；猛然或用力推

phrases.tran_cn: 推力滚珠轴承；止推滚珠轴承
推力轴承；止推轴承；斜撑底座
使自己被注意；出头露面

trans.tran_cn: 刺，推力，[军]突击，[地]逆断层
trans.tran_en: the main meaning or aim of what someone is saying or doing
to make a sudden movement forward with a sword or knife

trans.tran_cn: 插入，用力向某人刺去，猛然或用力推

trans.tran_en: to make a sudden movement forward with a sword or knife

trans.tran_cn: 猛推，逼迫，强行推入，延伸
